tool_description: General and detailed fleet information for over 1,000 airlines. See more info  at https://api-ninjas.com/api/airlines.
name: Airlines by API-Ninjas
title: Airlines by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/airlines
api_list.description: API Ninjas Airlines API endpoint. At least one of the optional parameters must be provided.

optional_parameters.name: iata
optional_parameters.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 2-character airline code.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Airline name. This parameter supports partial matching (e.g. United will match United Airlines)

optional_parameters.name: icao
optional_parameters.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 3-character airline code.
